department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two panels sewn together; top panel is maroon woven with geometric designs in white, yellow, green, purple and tan; bottom panel of cream color has large central band of geometric weaving in rust bordered by two bands of black weaving with geometricized animals, birds and figures; braided fringe in purple, cream, pale pink, green, mustard and red
title: Shoulder cloth (pa biang)
